00007 #include "Resource.h"
00008 #include "Utility.h"
00009 #include "WPIStatus.h"
00010 
00011 Resource *Resource::m_resourceList = NULL;
00012 
00018 Resource::Resource(UINT32 elements)
00019 {
00020     m_size = elements;
00021     m_isAllocated = new bool[m_size];
00022     for (UINT32 i=0; i < m_size; i++)
00023         m_isAllocated[i] = false;
00024     m_nextResource = m_resourceList;
00025     m_resourceList = this;
00026 }
00027 
00028 /*static*/ void Resource::CreateResourceObject(Resource **r, UINT32 elements)
00029 {
00030     if (*r == NULL)
00031         *r = new Resource(elements);
00032 }
00033 
00038 Resource::~Resource()
00039 {
00040     delete[] m_isAllocated;
00041 }
00042 
00048 UINT32 Resource::Allocate()
00049 {
00050     for (UINT32 i=0; i < m_size; i++)
00051     {
00052         if ( ! m_isAllocated[i])
00053         {
00054             m_isAllocated[i] = true;
00055             return i;
00056         }
00057     }
00058     wpi_fatal(NoAvailablePorts);
00059     return ~0ul;
00060 }
00061 
00067 UINT32 Resource::Allocate(UINT32 index)
00068 {
00069     if (index >= m_size)
00070     {
00071         wpi_fatal(IndexOutOfRange);
00072         return ~0ul;
00073     }
00074     if ( m_isAllocated[index] )
00075     {
00076         wpi_fatal(ResourceAlreadyAllocated);
00077         return ~0ul;
00078     }
00079     m_isAllocated[index] = true;
00080     return index;
00081 }
00082 
00083 
00089 void Resource::Free(UINT32 index)
00090 {
00091     if (index >= m_size)
00092     {
00093         wpi_fatal(IndexOutOfRange);
00094         return;
00095     }
00096     if (!m_isAllocated[index])
00097     {
00098         wpi_fatal(NotAllocated);
00099         return;
00100     }
00101     m_isAllocated[index] = false;
00102 }
